.auth-section {
  position: relative;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background: url('../../assets/img/auth-bg.jpg') no-repeat;
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  min-height: calc(100vh - 30px);

  &::before {
    content: '';

    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    background: rgba(15, 29, 45, 0.5);
